official_title: A bill to prohibit the importation into the United States of goods that are the products of countries that aid or abet acts of international terrorism against the person or property of United States citizens.

summary.text: Amends the Tariff Act of 1930 to permit from foreign countries the President to prohibit the importation of products that aid acts of international terrorism against U.S. persons or property.

titles.title: A bill to prohibit the importation into the United States of goods that are the products of countries that aid or abet acts of international terrorism against the person or property of United States citizens.
